item.name: AuthToken (Run Me First)
item.description:
**Description**

This Postman collection is designed to streamline the process of authentication and token generation for use in various other collections and requests. The "AuthToken" collection provides a set of requests and scripts to obtain and manage authentication tokens required for accessing secured APIs. The generated tokens are stored in environment variables for easy reuse in subsequent requests.

**How to Use**

1. Setup the necessory environment variables, including base url, username, password, etc. to match your authentication requirements.
2. Execute the "TokenRequest" request to obtain an access token from your authentication server.
3. The response will automatically extract the access token and store it in the `token` environment variable.
4. Use the stored token in other collections and requests by referencing \`\` in your Authorization headers.
    

By utilizing the "AuthToken" collection, you can simplify the process of managing authentication tokens, ensuring secure and efficient access to your APIs across different Postman collections.
